invalid-spf: ❌ spf headers missingo r invalid, the email might not come from who you thing it is
invalid-dkim: ❌ DKIM missing or invalid, there is a chance this email might have been altered (or the sender's DNS is misconfigured) be extra vigilant
invalid-dmarc: ❌ DMARC not valid, make sure that spf and dkim are valid
